text: "The Lovercall" is the debut single by Austrian pop rock band The Makemakes. It was released as a digital download in Austria on 15 June 2012. The song peaked to number 6 on the Austrian Singles Chart. ==Track listing== ==Chart performance== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2012) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |} ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Label |- ! scope="row"| Austria | 15 June 2012 | Digital download | Almost Perfecto Records |} ==References== Category:2012 debut singles Category:2012 songs Category:The Makemakes songs
title: The Lovercall
